Package com.sharetea.backend.Repositories

Interface InventoryRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Inventory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Inventory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Inventory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Inventory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Inventory,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Inventory>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Inventory,Integer>
@Repository public interface InventoryRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Inventory,Integer>

  • Method Details

    • findByName

      @Query(value="select * from inventory where name = ?1", nativeQuery=true) Inventory findByName(String name)
      Finds inventory in the database by its name
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the inventory
      Returns:
      Inventory object

    • deleteByName

      void deleteByName(String name)
      Deletes inventory by name
      Parameters:
      name - Inventory name

    • findToppings

      @Query(value="select * from inventory where active = \'true\' and is_topping = \'true\'", nativeQuery=true) List<Inventory> findToppings()
      Selects inventory items that are toppings
      Returns:
      List of inventory objects

    • findLowStock

      @Query(value="select name, quantity from inventory where quantity < 100", nativeQuery=true) List<Map<String,Object>> findLowStock()
      Gets inventory items under 100 stock quantity
      Returns:
      JSON Object for inventory and their stock remaining

    • findByActive

      List<Inventory> findByActive(Boolean active)
      Finds inventory items that are active
      Parameters:
      active - Boolean flag for active / inactive
      Returns:
      List of inventory objects

    • getFavoriteToppings

      @Query(value="select * from inventory where inventory_id in (select inventory_id from item_toppings where order_product_id = ?1)", nativeQuery=true) List<Map<String,Object>> getFavoriteToppings(Integer opID)
      Gets inventory items in a favorite order_product
      Parameters:
      opID - order_product_id to identify order_product
      Returns:
      JSON Object that with topping details

    • getFavoriteItemToppings

      @Query(value="select item_toppings_id from item_toppings where order_product_id = ?1", nativeQuery=true) List<Integer> getFavoriteItemToppings(Integer opID)
      Gets item_topping_ids for a favorite product
      Parameters:
      opID - order_product_id to identify order_product
      Returns:
      List of integer item_toppings_id

    • subtractInventory

      @Modifying @Query(value="UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE inventory_id IN (SELECT inventory_id FROM inventory_product WHERE product_id = ?1)", nativeQuery=true) void subtractInventory(Integer productID)
      Subtracts inventory stock quantity during ordering process
      Parameters:
      productID - product_id to identify product and then its recipe

    • subtractInventoryByID

      @Modifying @Query(value="UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE inventory_id IN (:inventories) ", nativeQuery=true) void subtractInventoryByID(@Param("inventories") List<Integer> inventories)
      Subtracts 1 unit quantity from inventory items
      Parameters:
      inventories - Inventory list to identify inventory items to be subtracted
